short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extention that allows any user to easily swap a word or phrase with another word or phrase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exciting new chrome extension that allows user to swap any word/phrase on their browser to any word/phase they want! Ease of use allows for optimal user experience! Now include new feature to replace every image on the browser to a image of choice! We can't wait for you to try it out.
